content: learn to crochet the california dreaming pot holder this fun granny square pot holder is a great way to use up scrap yarn and play with colour this pot holder is made up of 2 granny squares that are joined together as you crochet which makes it double thick a camel stitch border is added for a touch of elegance as well as a chain-circle for hanging > this pot holder pattern is the 5th pattern in the ** 2023 pot holders galore crochet-along 1 ** with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 12 +1 bonus pot holder patterns one pattern every month during the crochet-along in december you ll receive the final pot holder along with the bonus pattern > the free pattern for the california dreaming pot holder can be found ** here 2 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found **here ** 3 > you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along ** here 4 ** skill level intermediate language english crochet terminology us terms size this pot holder measures 7 75 wide x 7 75 long but instructions are provided to customize the size of your pot holder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 140 yds / 128 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * stitch marker or safety pin i hope you enjoy making your pot holders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-a-granny-square-pot-holder-pgcal2023 3 https //youtu be/_lfmu_lgk0m 4 https //thispixiecreates com/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023-main-page/
